Reintroduced a bipartisan and bicameral bill, which would strengthen our partnership with Taiwan. The Taiwan Representative Office Act would direct the US Secretary of State to enter into negotiations to rename Taiwan's de facto embassy to “Taiwan Representative Office”. ?1/2
